commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The student council presidential election day is finally here.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I wonder if Setsuna will come back to the club if she wins the election.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Win or lose, I just want her back. I haven't been able to speak to her since the other day, but I'm planning on seeing her as many times as I need to invite her back.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'll go with you when you do!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great, thanks! Anyway, let's cheer for Setsuna today for her election!

commands.speaker: Election Committee Member
commands.line: We will now have our candidates deliver their final speeches before voting begins. Nana Nakagawa, please deliver your speech first.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Yes.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nana is looking sharp and strong. She's exuding the aura of a winner, Shizuko!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah, she's full of confidence.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Good luck, Nana. Rina-chan Board says, "Go, go, Nana! Woo!"

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Good morning, all. My name is Nana Nakagawa. While this may be my final speech, my goals have not changed since what I spoke about during the debate.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I will continue to strive to create a school where everyone can pursue their passions. To do so, I will start off by creating an app to gather ideas and suggestions.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Your requests will be shared within the student council and school and will be categorized into study, clubs, or social, to also speed up investigation and response time.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: And in order to support your passions, various suggestions will be presented before creating a system based on what you have all decided on.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Setsuna's incredible. She really has put a lot of thought into how we can all enjoy our years in high school.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (But something about her is different. She doesn't seem like herself.)

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Our high school life only lasts for three years. If we live for 80 years, then high school will only make up 4% of our lives.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: How you decide to spend your time is up to you. Please let me help you with the path you choose.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: This concludes my speech. Thank you very much for your undivided attention.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wow, that's an incredible round of applause.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yes, it was an impressive speech. I was surprised when she said she'd take on the election by herself, but maybe my concerns were unwarranted.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She might just go on and win this election.

commands.speaker: Election Committee Member
commands.line: Thank you very much. Next up, Shioriko Mifune. Please deliver your speech.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Good morning, everyone. I am Shioriko Mifune. I have one thing I would like to tell you all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I promise you experiences of success in order to make your time at Nijigasaki High School directly relevant to your growth for the future.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I will provide all students with guidance so that everyone may have a more assured future waiting for them.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They're clapping just as loudly as they did for Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It'll be fine! Shioriko Mifune is just saying that she'll be telling them to do this and that, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Obviously, everybody will be against being restricted by her!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Some may find the pledge delivered by Nana to be ideal.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: She has fleshed out the vague portions she mentioned in the debate, and I have also been led to feel that her vision is another possible way to run a student council.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While we are striving for different visions, her goal would lead to everyone enjoying their lives in high school, if it can be brought to fruition.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ("If"...? What is Mifune trying to say?)

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, I can assert that it is not possible for Nana's pledge to be realized.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (What is she saying? Knowing Setsuna, I'm sure she has plans to create the app and concrete ideas. What is she trying to say she lacks?)

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: This is because there are discrepancies in the foundations of her approach.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Nana stated that she would create a school where one can pursue their passions, and that passion leads to strength.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Nana, what is it that you love? Can you confidently say that your student council duties are what you absolutely love above all else?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: *Gasp*

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I assume the answer is "no." She has something else that she loves and is suppressing this love to become the school council president in order to protect it.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: She is attempting to push against her feelings to fulfill her student council duties.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Her stance contradicts her so-called ideals.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is it not obvious that she will fail part way through her tenure by performing her student council presidential duties with such contradictory emotions?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: How could you say that! I... I take my student council duties...more seriously than...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Are my assertions incorrect, then?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The fact that you cannot dismiss me outright offers a clear answer.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: To borrow from your own words, working for the sake of all students as the student council president is what I love doing the most.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, the same cannot be said for you, can it?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Which is why I will say this once again. Your plan cannot be realized. It is merely a pie in the sky, the work of dreams. Can you refute this?

commands.speaker: Election Committee Member
commands.line: ...The time has now come for voting to begin. Students, please write the name of the candidate you wish to vote for on the ballot.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Setsuna will be okay, right?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Mifune is awfully mean to say such things on stage! Imagine being told things like that...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Setsuna looked pale in the face.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Isn't it against the rules to say things like that in your final speech?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: That wasn't a speech. It wasn't even a debate. It was one-sided!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I feel like she took hold of everyone's feelings with that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, let's head over to see Setsu right now!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-Yeah, I want to be there by her side.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, wait. We need to vote first. We need to vote for Setsuna.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And I also think that Setsuna has her own sense of pride. We should wait until the results are in before we go and see her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Despite what I say, I actually really want to go and see Setsuna right now. Why is it that now, of all times, we can't be by her side to support her?!)

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I, Shioriko Mifune, am proud to have been chosen as your student council president.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you very much for your approval of my ideas. I will make Nijigasaki High School...

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I lost.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I'm too ashamed to face everyone.
